text: A Night in Heaven is a 1983 American romantic drama movie directed by John G. Avildsen and starring Christopher Atkins, Lesley Ann Warren, Robert Logan, Deney Terrio, Deborah Rush, Carrie Snodgress, Andy Garcia. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was a box office bomb. ==Other websites== * * Category:1983 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by John G. Avildsen Category:American independent movies Category:Movies set in Florida
title: A Night in Heaven
